document_data.name: ''Cloak of Invisibility''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''cloak of invisibility''''' was a powerful magical cloak that allowed its wearer to become invisible for a cumulative total of 2 hours.  It then regains 1 hour of use per 12 continual hours of not being used.
document_data.Powers: The wearer activated the cloak's power by pulling up its hood. The ''cloak of invisibility'' then turned the wearer and everything being worn or carried invisible for as long as the hood was pulled up.
document_data.Notable Cloak of Invisibility:
[[File:Daveak's cloak.png|thumb|''Daveak's cloak of invisibility.'']]
*''Daveak's cloak'': the enchanted cloak from [[Chult]], found in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. This cloak allowed the wearer to turn invisible at will and sages argued about its origins and even how its enchantments were weaved.{{Template:Cite game/Tales from Candlekeep: Tomb of Annihilation}}
document_data.Notable Owners: The mercenary [[Jarlaxle Baenre]] owned a ''cloak of invisibility'' as part of his extensive collection of magic items.
